question.title: Will Coca-Cola recall any products due to metal contamination by August 2024?
question.body: This question resolves as YES if, by August 31, 2024, Coca-Cola announces a recall of any of its products due to metal contamination. The recall must be officially confirmed by Coca-Cola or a relevant food safety authority (such as the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service) and reported by at least two reputable news sources (e.g., Associated Press, Reuters, CNN, New York Times). The contamination must specifically involve metal materials found in the food products. If no such recall occurs within the specified timeframe, the question resolves as NO.

not_P.title: Will Coca-Cola not recall any products due to metal contamination by August 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves as YES if, by August 31, 2024, Coca-Cola does not announce a recall of any of its products due to metal contamination. The recall must not be officially confirmed by Coca-Cola or a relevant food safety authority (such as the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service) and not reported by at least two reputable news sources (e.g., Associated Press, Reuters, CNN, New York Times). The contamination must not specifically involve metal materials found in the food products. If such a recall occurs within the specified timeframe, the question resolves as NO.

not_P.title: Will neither Coca-Cola nor Danone recall any products due to metal contamination by August 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves as YES if, by August 31, 2024, neither Coca-Cola nor Danone announces a recall of any of their products due to metal contamination. The recall must not be officially confirmed by the respective company (Coca-Cola or Danone) or a relevant food safety authority (such as the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service) and not reported by at least two reputable news sources (e.g., Associated Press, Reuters, CNN, New York Times). The contamination must not specifically involve metal materials found in the food products. If such a recall does occur for either company within the specified timeframe, the question resolves as NO.

not_P.title: Will either Coca-Cola or Danone recall any products due to metal contamination by August 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves as YES if, by August 31, 2024, either Coca-Cola or Danone announces a recall of any of their products due to metal contamination. The recall must be officially confirmed by the respective company (Coca-Cola or Danone) or a relevant food safety authority (such as the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service) and reported by at least two reputable news sources (e.g., Associated Press, Reuters, CNN, New York Times). The contamination must specifically involve metal materials found in the food products. If such a recall does not occur for either company within the specified timeframe, the question resolves as NO.
